docs.title: django-debug-toolbar
docs.text:
settings.py 

INTERNAL_IPS = [
    # ...
    "127.0.0.1",
    # ...
]

ALLOWED_HOSTS = [
    # ...
]
urls.py 
if settings.DEBUG:
    urlpatterns += static(settings.MEDIA_URL, document_root=settings.MEDIA_ROOT)

if settings.DEBUG:

    import debug_toolbar
    urlpatterns = [
        path("__debug__/", include('debug_toolbar.urls')),
    ]
